C

changeUsername(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Change the username.
changeUsername(String) - Method in class stream.EchoClient
Change the username.
Chat - Class in view
Chat extends JFrame.
Chat(Controller, String) - Constructor for class view.Chat
Class constructor.
ChatGroup - Class in stream
ChatGroup is the class that defines a group chat with members that can send each others messages A ChatGroup is composed of: A ArrayList of ClientThread : all the ClientThreads connected to the Server A ArrayList of ChatGroup : all the existent ChatGroups on the Server A ArrayList of String : lists the usernames of the members of the chat A File : file where the history of the messages is saved A String : the group name
ChatGroup(String, ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class stream.ChatGroup
Class constructor.
ClientThread - Class in stream
ClientThread is the class that defines a client on the server side A ClientThread is composed of: A Socket : socket to which the client is connected and on which messages between the server and the client are exchanged A BufferedReader socIn : connected to the socket and receives data in form of Strings A PrintStream socOut : connected to the socket and sends data in form of Strings A String : username of the Client A ChatGroup : the general ChatGroup on which all Clients are connected A ArrayList of ChatGroup : list of the groups of which the client is a member ClientThread inherits Thread
ClientThreadListener - Class in stream
ClientThreadListener is the class that defines a TCP Client (thread that listens the message).
clientThreads - Static variable in class stream.ChatGroup
 
closeEverything() - Method in class stream.ClientThread
This method closes the Socket, the BufferedReader and the PrintStream
closeEverything() - Method in class stream.ClientThreadListener
This method closes the Socket and the BufferedReader.
closeEverything() - Method in class stream.EchoClient
This method closes the Socket, the BufferedReader, the PrintStream and close everything in the clientThreadListener.
closeEverything() - Method in class streamudp.UDP_Client
This method closes the Scanner and the MulticastSocket
closeEverything() - Method in class streamudp.UDP_ClientThreadListener
This method closes the MulticastSocket
closeLandingPage() - Method in class controller.Controller
Close the landingPage.
controller - package controller
 
Controller - Class in controller
Controller is the class that links the graphical interface of the chat with the echo client that communicates with the server.
Controller() - Constructor for class controller.Controller
Default class constructor.
createChat(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Create a Chat the graphical interface for the user to enter messages and see its received messages.
